newsitem.title: USA: Horizon/CMS Healthcare, Regency sign deals.
newsitem.headline: Horizon/CMS Healthcare, Regency sign deals.

text.p: Horizon/CMS Healthcare Corp said it had signed definitive agreements to sell to Regency Health Services Inc its interest in four acute rehabilitation hospitals.
Horizon/CMS said it was also selling to Regency its Meridian Neuro Care business, which operates six congregate care facilities in California.
It said it expected to receive about $36.3 million in cash and about $7.0 million original principal amount of promissory notes for working capital retained by Regency.
It said it would also retain net working capital of about $11.2 million.
The deals are to close by the end of the year, it added.
Horizon/CMS Healthcare Corporation is a provider of post acute health care services and long-term care services, principally in the Midwest, Southwest and Northeast regions of the United States.
